name: Whack A Fact
description:
# Overview

This project is for the 2021 Odin Project Game Jam. Based on the popular *Whack a Mole* game, it allows users to test their general math, science, geography, etc. knowledge by selecting correct questions from a grid in the allotted time.

# Theme: Education

# Age: 9-12 years

# Implementation: Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript using only DOM.
